ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Reed's Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet V 1.12
ygData.msgSnippet: talking about songs, i used shield of songs for the first time this morning for an extended duration.  Its nice that it has an icon now, but no text message is
ygData.messageBody:
talking about songs, i used shield of songs for the first time this morning
for an extended duration. Its nice that it has an icon now, but no text
message is somewhat a nuicance, but not nearly as ANNOYING as the cleric
buff noise it makes when pulsing it 2 times with 1 pulse of VoV

Minkin

Hope they pick up on that soon

-----Original Message-----
From: Reed Stormwind [mailto:eqreed@...]
Sent: March 7, 2001 7:35 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Reed's Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet V 1.12


I've a new version out, which is available here:

http://www.geocities.com/eqreed/BardSongSpreadsheet.html

(I'm trying out a primitive web page - I hope it works). Hopefully,
this will be on Rokenn's site shortly :)

Things changed:
- Have some initial numbers for March of the Wee (52);
- Noted Catana (34) stamina effects.
- Occlusion(55) is a -MR/HR/CR debuff song, not what is given.
- Fixed Song of Twlight notes.
- March of the Wee (52) does not stack with CoB (1) or Guardian
Rythms (17).
- Song of Highsun (56) does not require wind instrument, and removes
2 buffs against a PC.
- Dennons Desp Dirge (43) and Song of Midnight are AE centered on
target; added time restriction to notes.
- Song of Twilight (53) interrupts casting mobs.
- Added 20 mana song.
- Modified Denon's Desperate Dirge (43) but numbers not verified.
- Occlusion of Sound (55) does not interrupt casts.

As always, if you've any comments, or especially if you see anything
wrong, please e-mail me (eqreed@...). It's through everyone's
discussions of the songs that I figure this stuff out :)

- Reed Stormwind (52 bard of E'ci)



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
